title: About Me
introduction:
Born in 1999. Born and raised in Osaka, currently residing in Tokyo.
At university, I studied in the Faculty of Science and Engineering, Department of Information Science, and belonged to the Natural Language Processing Laboratory.
I have extensive experience in web application development, covering backend, frontend, and batch processing.
I've been interested in natural language processing since my student days, and currently I'm personally developing a language learning app that utilizes YouTube subtitles and generative AI.
